verses.text: I will \w love|strong="H7355"\w* thee, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, my \w strength|strong="H2391"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* my \w rock|strong="H5553"\w*, and my \w fortress|strong="H4686"\w*, and my \w deliverer|strong="H6403"\w*; my \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, my \w strength|strong="H6697"\w*, in whom I will \w trust|strong="H2620"\w*; my \w buckler|strong="H4043"\w*, and the \w horn|strong="H7161"\w* of my \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w*, \add and\add* my high \w tower|strong="H4869"\w*.\f + \fr 18.2 \ft my strength: Heb. my rock\f*

I will \w call|strong="H7121"\w* upon the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add who is worthy\add* to be \w praised|strong="H1984"\w*: so shall I be \w saved|strong="H3467"\w* from mine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*.

The \w sorrows|strong="H2256"\w* of \w death|strong="H4194"\w* \w compassed|strong="H0661"\w* me, and the \w floods|strong="H5158"\w* of ungodly \w men|strong="H1100"\w* made me \w afraid|strong="H1204"\w*.\f + \fr 18.4 \ft ungodly men: Heb. Belial\f*

The \w sorrows|strong="H2256"\w* of \w hell|strong="H7585"\w* compassed me \w about|strong="H5437"\w*: the \w snares|strong="H4170"\w* of \w death|strong="H4194"\w* \w prevented|strong="H6923"\w* me.\f + \fr 18.5 \ft sorrows: or, cords\f*

In my \w distress|strong="H6862"\w* I \w called|strong="H7121"\w* upon the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w cried|strong="H7768"\w* unto my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: he \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* my \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* out of his \w temple|strong="H1964"\w*, and my \w cry|strong="H7775"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him, \add even\add* into his \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*.

Then the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w shook|strong="H1607"\w* and \w trembled|strong="H7493"\w*; the \w foundations|strong="H4146"\w* also of the \w hills|strong="H2022"\w* \w moved|strong="H7264"\w* and were \w shaken|strong="H1607"\w*, because he was \w wroth|strong="H2734"\w*.

There went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* a \w smoke|strong="H6227"\w* out of his \w nostrils|strong="H0639"\w*, and \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* out of his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w*: \w coals|strong="H1513"\w* were \w kindled|strong="H1197"\w* by it.\f + \fr 18.8 \ft out of his nostrils: Heb. by his, etc\f*
He \w bowed|strong="H5186"\w* the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* also, and came \w down|strong="H3381"\w*: and \w darkness|strong="H6205"\w* \add was\add* under his \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*.

And he \w rode|strong="H7392"\w* upon a \w cherub|strong="H3742"\w*, and did \w fly|strong="H5774"\w*: yea, he did \w fly|strong="H1675"\w* upon the \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* of the \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*.

He \w made|strong="H7896"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w* his secret \w place|strong="H5643"\w*; his \w pavilion|strong="H5521"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* him \add were\add* \w dark|strong="H2824"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \add and\add* thick \w clouds|strong="H5645"\w* of the \w skies|strong="H7834"\w*.

At the \w brightness|strong="H5051"\w* \add that was\add* before him his thick \w clouds|strong="H5645"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w*, \w hail|strong="H1259"\w* \add stones\add* and \w coals|strong="H1513"\w* of \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* also \w thundered|strong="H7481"\w* in the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, and the \w Highest|strong="H5945"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* his \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*; \w hail|strong="H1259"\w* \add stones\add* and \w coals|strong="H1513"\w* of \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

Yea, he sent \w out|strong="H7971"\w* his \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w*, and \w scattered|strong="H6327"\w* them; and he shot \w out|strong="H7232"\w* \w lightnings|strong="H1300"\w*, and \w discomfited|strong="H2000"\w* them.

Then the \w channels|strong="H0650"\w* of \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* were \w seen|strong="H7200"\w*, and the \w foundations|strong="H4146"\w* of the \w world|strong="H8398"\w* were \w discovered|strong="H1540"\w* at thy \w rebuke|strong="H1606"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, at the \w blast|strong="H5397"\w* of the \w breath|strong="H7307"\w* of thy \w nostrils|strong="H0639"\w*.

He \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* from \w above|strong="H4791"\w*, he \w took|strong="H3947"\w* me, he \w drew|strong="H4871"\w* me out of \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*.\f + \fr 18.16 \ft many: or, great\f*

He \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* me from my \w strong|strong="H5794"\w* \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*, and from them which \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* me: for they were too \w strong|strong="H0553"\w* for me.
They \w prevented|strong="H6923"\w* me in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of my \w calamity|strong="H0343"\w*: but the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was my \w stay|strong="H4937"\w*.
He brought me \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* also into a large \w place|strong="H4800"\w*; he \w delivered|strong="H2502"\w* me, because he \w delighted|strong="H2654"\w* in me.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w rewarded|strong="H1580"\w* me according to my \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*; according to the \w cleanness|strong="H1252"\w* of my \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* hath he \w recompensed|strong="H7725"\w* me.
For I have \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* the \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and have not wickedly \w departed|strong="H7561"\w* from my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
For all his \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w* \add were\add* before me, and I did not put \w away|strong="H5493"\w* his \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w* from me.
I was also \w upright|strong="H8549"\w* before him, and I \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* myself from mine \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*.\f + \fr 18.23 \ft before: Heb. with\f*

Therefore hath the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w recompensed|strong="H7725"\w* me according to my \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*, according to the \w cleanness|strong="H1252"\w* of my \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* in his \w eyesight|strong="H5869"\w*.\f + \fr 18.24 \ft in…: Heb. before his eyes\f*

With the \w merciful|strong="H2623"\w* thou wilt shew thyself \w merciful|strong="H2616"\w*; with an \w upright|strong="H8549"\w* \w man|strong="H1399"\w* thou wilt shew thyself \w upright|strong="H8552"\w*;

With the \w pure|strong="H1305"\w* thou wilt shew thyself \w pure|strong="H1305"\w*; and with the \w froward|strong="H6141"\w* thou wilt shew thyself \w froward|strong="H6617"\w*.\f + \fr 18.26 \ft shew thyself froward: or, wrestle\f*
For thou wilt \w save|strong="H3467"\w* the \w afflicted|strong="H6041"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; but wilt bring \w down|strong="H8213"\w* \w high|strong="H7311"\w* \w looks|strong="H5869"\w*.

For thou wilt \w light|strong="H0215"\w* my \w candle|strong="H5216"\w*: the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w* will \w enlighten|strong="H5050"\w* my \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*.\f + \fr 18.28 \ft candle: or, lamp\f*

For by thee I have run \w through|strong="H7323"\w* a \w troop|strong="H1416"\w*; and by my \w God|strong="H0430"\w* have I leaped \w over|strong="H1801"\w* a \w wall|strong="H7791"\w*.\f + \fr 18.29 \ft run…: or, broken\f*

\add As for\add* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, his \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \add is\add* \w perfect|strong="H8549"\w*: the \w word|strong="H0565"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* is \w tried|strong="H6884"\w*: he \add is\add* a \w buckler|strong="H4043"\w* to all those that \w trust|strong="H2620"\w* in him.\f + \fr 18.30 \ft tried: or, refined\f*

For who \add is\add* \w God|strong="H0433"\w* \w save|strong="H1107"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*? or who \add is\add* a \w rock|strong="H6697"\w* \w save|strong="H2108"\w* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*?

\add It is\add* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* that \w girdeth|strong="H0247"\w* me with \w strength|strong="H2428"\w*, and \w maketh|strong="H5414"\w* my \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w perfect|strong="H8549"\w*.
He \w maketh|strong="H7737"\w* my \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* like \w hinds’|strong="H0355"\w* \add feet\add*, and \w setteth|strong="H5975"\w* me upon my high \w places|strong="H1116"\w*.

He \w teacheth|strong="H3925"\w* my \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* to \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, so that a \w bow|strong="H7198"\w* of \w steel|strong="H5154"\w* is \w broken|strong="H5181"\w* by mine \w arms|strong="H2220"\w*.

Thou hast also \w given|strong="H5414"\w* me the \w shield|strong="H4043"\w* of thy \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w*: and thy right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* hath holden me \w up|strong="H5582"\w*, and thy \w gentleness|strong="H6037"\w* hath made me \w great|strong="H7235"\w*.\f + \fr 18.35 \ft thy gentleness…: or, with thy meekness thou hast multiplied me\f*
Thou hast \w enlarged|strong="H7337"\w* my \w steps|strong="H6806"\w* under me, that my \w feet|strong="H7166"\w* did not \w slip|strong="H4571"\w*.\f + \fr 18.36 \ft my feet: Heb. mine ankles\f*

I have \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* mine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, and \w overtaken|strong="H5381"\w* them: neither did I turn \w again|strong="H7725"\w* till they were \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w*.
I have \w wounded|strong="H4272"\w* them that they were not \w able|strong="H3201"\w* to \w rise|strong="H6965"\w*: they are \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* under my \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*.

For thou hast \w girded|strong="H0247"\w* me with \w strength|strong="H2428"\w* unto the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*: thou hast \w subdued|strong="H3766"\w* under me those that rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w* against me.\f + \fr 18.39 \ft subdued: Heb. caused to bow\f*
Thou hast also \w given|strong="H5414"\w* me the \w necks|strong="H6203"\w* of mine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*; that I might \w destroy|strong="H6789"\w* them that \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* me.

They \w cried|strong="H7768"\w*, but \add there was\add* none to \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \add them: even\add* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, but he \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* them not.

Then did I \w beat|strong="H7833"\w* them small as the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*: I did cast them \w out|strong="H7324"\w* as the \w dirt|strong="H2916"\w* in the \w streets|strong="H2351"\w*.

Thou hast \w delivered|strong="H6403"\w* me from the \w strivings|strong="H7379"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; \add and\add* thou hast \w made|strong="H7760"\w* me the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*: a \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add whom\add* I have not \w known|strong="H3045"\w* shall \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* me.

As soon as they \w hear|strong="H8088"\w* of me, they shall \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* me: the \w strangers|strong="H1121"\w* shall \w submit|strong="H3584"\w* themselves unto me.\f + \fr 18.44 \ft As soon…: Heb. At the hearing of the ear\f*\f + \fr 18.44 \ft submit…: or, yield feigned obedience\f*\f + \fr 18.44 \ft strangers: Heb. sons of the stranger\f*

The \w strangers|strong="H1121"\w* shall fade \w away|strong="H5034"\w*, and be \w afraid|strong="H2727"\w* out of their close \w places|strong="H4526"\w*.\f + \fr 18.45 \ft strangers: Heb. sons of the stranger\f*

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*; and \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add be\add* my \w rock|strong="H6697"\w*; and let the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of my \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w* be \w exalted|strong="H7311"\w*.

\add It is\add* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* that \w avengeth|strong="H5414"\w* me, and \w subdueth|strong="H1696"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* under me.\f + \fr 18.47 \ft avengeth: Heb. giveth avengements for\f*\f + \fr 18.47 \ft subdueth: or, destroyeth\f*

He \w delivereth|strong="H6403"\w* me from mine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*: yea, thou liftest me \w up|strong="H7311"\w* above those that rise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* against me: thou hast \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* me from the \w violent|strong="H2555"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*.\f + \fr 18.48 \ft violent…: Heb. man of violence\f*

Therefore will I give \w thanks|strong="H3034"\w* unto thee, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, and sing \w praises|strong="H2167"\w* unto thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.\f + \fr 18.49 \ft give…: or, confess\f*

\w Great|strong="H1431"\w* \w deliverance|strong="H3444"\w* giveth he to his \w king|strong="H4428"\w*; and \w sheweth|strong="H6213"\w* \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* to his \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w*, to \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and to his \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w evermore|strong="H5769"\w*.
